com.whaleal.mars.core.aggregation.expressions

类 ArrayExpressions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.whaleal.mars.core.aggregation.expressions.ArrayExpressions

  • public final class ArrayExpressions
extends Object
    Defines helper methods for the array expressions

    Expressions

    • 方法详细资料

      • array

        public static ArrayExpression array(Expression... expressions)
        Creates an array of the given expressions. This "expression" isn't so much a mongodb expression as it is a convenience method for building pipeline definitions.
        参数:
        expressions - the expressions
        返回:
        the new expression

      • arrayToObject

        public static Expression arrayToObject(Expression array)
        Converts an array of key value pairs to a document.
        参数:
        array - the array to use
        返回:
        the new expression $arrayToObject

      • concatArrays

        public static Expression concatArrays(Expression array,
                                      Expression additional)
        Concatenates arrays to return the concatenated array.
        参数:
        array - the array to use
        additional - any additional arrays to concatenate
        返回:
        the new expression $concatArrays

      • elementAt

        public static Expression elementAt(Expression array,
                                   Expression index)
        Returns the element at the specified array index.
        参数:
        array - the array to use
        index - the index to return
        返回:
        the new expression $arrayElemAt

      • filter

        public static ArrayFilterExpression filter(Expression array,
                                           Expression conditional)
        Selects a subset of the array to return an array with only the elements that match the filter condition.
        参数:
        array - the array to use
        conditional - the conditional to use for filtering
        返回:
        the new expression $filter

      • in

        public static Expression in(Expression search,
                            Expression array)
        Returns a boolean indicating whether a specified value is in an array.
        参数:
        search - the expression to search for
        array - the array to use
        返回:
        the new expression $in

      • indexOfArray

        public static Expression indexOfArray(Expression array,
                                      Expression search)
        Searches an array for an occurrence of a specified value and returns the array index of the first occurernce. If the substring is not found, returns -1.
        参数:
        array - the array to use
        search - the expression to search for
        返回:
        the new expression $indexOfArray

      • isArray

        public static Expression isArray(Expression array)
        Determines if the operand is an array. Returns a boolean.
        参数:
        array - the array to use
        返回:
        the new expression $isArray

      • map

        public static MapExpression map(Expression input,
                                Expression in)
        Applies a subexpression to each element of an array and returns the array of resulting values in order. Accepts named parameters.
        参数:
        input - the array to use
        in - An expression that is applied to each element of the input array.
        返回:
        the new expression $map

      • objectToArray

        public static Expression objectToArray(Expression array)
        Converts a document to an array of documents representing key-value pairs.
        参数:
        array - the array to use
        返回:
        the new expression $objectToArray

      • range

        public static RangeExpression range(int start,
                                    int end)
        Outputs an array containing a sequence of integers according to user-defined inputs.
        参数:
        start - the starting value
        end - the ending value
        返回:
        the new expression $range

      • reduce

        public static Expression reduce(Expression input,
                                Expression initial,
                                Expression in)
        Applies an expression to each element in an array and combines them into a single value.
        参数:
        input - the array to use
        initial - The initial cumulative value set before in is applied to the first element of the input array.
        in - A valid expression that $reduce applies to each element in the input array in left-to-right order.
        返回:
        the new expression $reduce

      • reverseArray

        public static Expression reverseArray(Expression array)
        Returns an array with the elements in reverse order.
        参数:
        array - the array to use
        返回:
        the new expression $reverseArray

      • size

        public static Expression size(Expression array)
        Counts and returns the total number of items in an array.
        参数:
        array - the array to use
        返回:
        the new expression $size

      • slice

        public static Expression slice(Expression array,
                               int size)
        Returns a subset of an array.
        参数:
        array - the array to use
        size - the number of elements to return
        返回:
        the new expression $slice

      • zip

        public static ZipExpression zip(Expression... arrays)
        Merge two arrays together.
        参数:
        arrays - the arrays to use
        返回:
        the new expression $zip
